definition: a round fruit of a tree of the rose family
sentence: She took a bite of the juicy apple.

definition: a piece of ground for growing plants
sentence: They spent the weekend planting flowers in the garden.

definition: a large mammal with a trunk
sentence: The elephant at the zoo was very friendly.

definition: a call to take part in a contest
sentence: She accepted the challenge to run a marathon.
Smartphones have become ubiquitous in modern society.
The lawyer tried to obfuscate the facts of the case.

definition: proceeding in a gradual, subtle way but with harmful effects
sentence: The insidious effects of the disease went unnoticed for years.
His quixotic quest for perfection often led to disappointment.

definition: opposition to the disestablishment of the Church of England
sentence: Antidisestablishmentarianism is often cited as one of the longest words in the English language.

definition: a person who acts obsequiously toward someone important in order to gain advantage
sentence: The sycophant always praised his boss, hoping for a promotion.
